mapper.select: select max(stage_num) from project_stage_tb where project_no = #{project_no}

select a.user_no from sys_user_role_tb a, sys_role_tb b where a.role_no = b.role_no and b.department = (select d.department from sys_user_role_tb c, sys_role_tb d where c.role_no = d.role_no and c.user_no = #{principal}) and b.position = '2'

select a.project_name, b.*, c.* from project_main_tb a, project_stage_tb b, project_stage_doc_tb c where a.project_no = b.project_no and a.stage_num = b.stage_num and b.doc_serial = c.serial_no and c.doc_version = '1.0' and b.is_end != '1'
select count(0) from project_stage_doc_tb where serial_no = #{doc_serial} and doc_no = #{doc_no}

select '' as serial_no, b.doc_no, b.doc_name, b.writer, b.department, b.duty_role, a.role_name from sys_role_tb a, pd_doc_defined_tb b where b.doc_no in (${unupload_doc}) and b.duty_role = a.role_no union select b.serial_no, b.doc_no, b.doc_name, c.writer, c.department, c.duty_role, d.role_name from project_stage_tb a, project_stage_doc_tb b, pd_doc_defined_tb c, sys_role_tb d where a.project_no = #{project_no} and a.stage_num = #{stage_num} and a.doc_serial = b.serial_no and b.doc_no = c.doc_no and b.doc_version = '1.0' and c.duty_role = d.role_no
select a.user_no from sys_user_tb a, sys_user_role_tb b, sys_role_tb c where a.user_no = b.user_no and b.role_no = c.role_no and c.position = '4'/*职位 4-文员*/
